pilots.title: Our Expert Pilots
pilots.subtitle: Meet our professional team of certified paragliding pilots

pilot1.name: Dang Van My
pilot1.des: Leader organizing national paragliding competitions, while translating over 1000 pages of professional books from the world's top 3 resources, making a significant contribution to Vietnam's sports aviation community.
pilot1.experience: Over 10 years of paragliding experience, with over 1,000 solo flights and 10,000 tandem flights. First Heli pilot in Vietnam and also the first and only tumbling pilot in Vietnam. He can perform high-level technical maneuvers and rare aerial acrobatics. Possesses paragliding and powered paragliding skills. Translator of over 1,000 pages of in-depth paragliding documentation and author of 3 bestselling books: 'Thermal Flying', 'Cross-Country Flying', and 'Understanding the Sky'. Has translated extensive flying materials with deep professional knowledge, and is the first Vietnamese pilot to receive IPPI5 certification in Japan.
pilot1.records: Currently holds the record for the largest closed triangle flight in the Central Highlands region (over 100 km) and is the pilot with the most flying hours in Vietnam.
pilot1.personality: On the ground, he is extremely disciplined and serious in his work and leadership role. But as soon as he takes off, he transforms into a 'child of the wind' â€” bringing joy, positive energy, and inspiring passion for all passengers who fly with him.

pilot2.name: Dinh The Anh
pilot2.des: A pilot full of athletic energy, from cycling, swimming to paragliding, with 2000 flights, over 1500 hours of safe flying, and 3 times precision landing champion in Vietnam.
pilot2.experience: Completed over 2,000 flights, with total safe flying time exceeding 1,000 hours. Vietnam's representative who flew directly to the 2023 Olympics in South Korea. Three-time champion in precision landing at national competitions. Has taken off from many countries around the world including: Switzerland, South Korea, USA, Thailand, Indonesia...
pilot2.records: Three-time precision landing champion in Vietnam and Vietnam's representative at the 2023 Paragliding Olympics in South Korea.
pilot2.personality: Known as the 'national brother' â€“ born and raised in Da Nang, this Central Vietnamese guy carries the gentleness and warmth of sea breeze and golden sunshine of his homeland. Impressive with a gentle smile, warm voice, and thoughtfulness in every action. Not only a top-notch pilot but also a professional photographer. Flying with him, you can be sure you'll have countless amazing photos, every angle is beautiful and every moment is memorable!

pilot3.name: Tuan Nguyen
pilot3.des: A gentle, caring pilot who always listens to passenger requests. Whether you like aggressive flying or gentle 'chill', he has the perfect camera angle and flight path, guaranteed everyone wants to... become a hardcore fan!
pilot3.experience: Has successfully completed over 1,000 tandem flights safely in Vietnam. Deep understanding of meteorology at flying sites across the country, with the ability to accurately assess and forecast weather for flying activities. Proficient in motorless and powered paragliding skills. A professional paragliding instructor who has trained and guided many pilots on their journey to conquer Vietnam's skies.
pilot3.records: Over 1,000 safe tandem flights, leading weather forecasting expert in the flying community, and experienced instructor at major flying sites across the country.
pilot3.personality: His nickname carries the chivalrous spirit of 'Second Voice' but his personality is extremely friendly and adorable. He especially loves children â€” after each flight, the little angels remember the kind pilot and send thank you letters. If parents are looking for someone trustworthy, dedicated, and full of positive energy to accompany their child on a journey to touch the clouds â€” then no one else, Second Voice is the perfect choice!

pilot4.name: Minh Trung
pilot4.des: Over 2,000 tandem flights, 7 years hanging in the sky, over 1,000 hours of 'playing with clouds and wind'. Nicknamed Trung Chocolate â€“ flying with him, you'll have fun chatting, laughing till your cheeks hurt!
pilot4.experience: Over 2,000 safe tandem flights with passengers. 7 years of paragliding experience, specializing in tandem and cross-country flying. Accumulated over 1,000 hours of actual flying, mastering various weather conditions and complex terrain. Graduated from a flight safety training course in Nepal â€“ a country with strict flying conditions and high international standards.
pilot4.records: Over 2,000 safe tandem flights, over 1,000 accumulated flying hours, and one of the rare Vietnamese pilots to complete the flight safety training course in Nepal.
pilot4.personality: The paraglide he's flying is a bright red and yellow flag â€” flying is spreading the inspiration of loving the country, loving the sky, loving life itself. Flying with him, your video easily gets millions of views on TikTok, photos and videos are 'top-notch' without editing, enough to make your crush miss a heartbeat. Friendly personality, cheerful, guaranteed you'll fly and laugh with your mouth wide open, forgetting all fear of heights. The only downside? Sun makes him dark, rain makes his hair frizzy â€” but his demeanor is still top-notch, his smile is flawless!

pilot5.name: Phan Hung
pilot5.des: Flying with him, you'll have million-view clips with super artistic camera angles. Absolute safe experience and beautiful sky moments captured, bringing back precious and unforgettable footage from each tandem flight.
pilot5.experience: Started pursuing his passion for paragliding in 2018 and is now a professional pilot with many years of flying experience in Vietnam. He has deep understanding of meteorology and terrain at flying sites across the country â€” key factors ensuring every flight is safe and provides optimal experience. Has completed over 1,000 professional tandem flights and continuously participates in international standard paragliding training and education programs.
pilot5.records: Over 1,000 professional tandem flights, expert in weather and terrain analysis, active member in international standard training programs.
pilot5.personality: Meet Phan Hung â€“ the 'rocker' of the sky, long hair flying in the wind like the paraglide itself. Flying with him, you not only get million-view clips but also million emotions. Over 1,000 flights â€“ each one is a story, a moment for life. Full of energy, understands terrain, passionate 'burning' â€“ always ready to take you touch the clouds!

pilot6.name: Ngo Van Doi
pilot6.des: Participates in every paragliding competition in Vietnam, holds the record of 7 hours of continuous flying at Buu Hill â€“ Chuong My. He is passionate about paragliding, bringing passengers thrilling, safe, and laughter-filled flying experiences.
pilot6.experience: From 2023 to 2025, he has completed over 500 solo and tandem flights at most famous flying sites across Vietnam. Accumulated over 300 hours of actual flying with 5 years of solid experience in paragliding. A familiar face at all paragliding competitions from South to North, always participating with professional competitive spirit and intense passion. Notably, he set a record of 7 hours of continuous flying at Buu Hill â€“ Chuong My, marking a proud milestone in his flying career.
pilot6.records: Record of 7 hours of continuous flying at Buu Hill â€“ Chuong My, over 500 flights in 2 years, and an active pilot participating in all paragliding competitions across the country.
pilot6.personality: A young man bringing wind into his smile â€” flying high without needing an 'elevator'! Burning passion for paragliding, with him every flight is a time his heart 'takes off'. Flying with him, you'll feel joy spreading in the blue sky â€” where strong winds are like applause cheering you on. A super dedicated friend, always ready to turn your flying dream into an exciting adventure!

pilot7.name: Minh Vo
pilot7.des: Fly with the 'million-like pilot' with 14 years of experience. Passionate about the sky since childhood, he spreads the fire through each tandem flight, bringing peak experience and memorable moments high in the sky for every customer.
pilot7.experience: With 14 years of paragliding experience and over 2,000 safe tandem flights, he is one of the most veteran and reliable pilots in Vietnam. One of the Top 5 first-generation pilots, he contributed to laying the foundation for the domestic paragliding community. In 2023, he and his team excellently won first place in the Precision Landing event at the MCC competition, affirming solid professional skills and competitive spirit.
pilot7.records: 14 years of experience, over 2,000 safe tandem flights. Top 5 first-generation pilot of Vietnam and won first place in Precision Landing at MCC 2023.
pilot7.personality: Minh Vo â€“ the 'million-like pilot' with passion for the sky since childhood, grew up only liking to chat with clouds and play with wind. Flying with him is not just going high, but also lifting your mood! Beautiful views, loud laughter, and positive energy spread throughout the trip. He spreads the fire lightly but powerfully â€” making everyone who flies want to... fly again!

pilot8.name: Toan Nguyen
pilot8.des: Over 10 years of riding clouds, nearly 5,000 flights. Flying across Vietnam: Kon Tum, Ly Son, Dien Bien... GPS hasn't even loaded yet, he's already landed! Paragliding with him is not just passion â€” it's a lifestyle in the clouds.
pilot8.experience: With over 10 years of experience conquering the sky and nearly 5,000 solo and tandem flights, he is one of the most experienced and reliable pilots in Vietnam. Graduated from an international standard flight safety training course. Has flown over most famous paragliding sites in the country including Kon Tum, Dak Nong, Nha Trang, Ly Son, Dien Bien Phu. Regularly participates in precision landing competitions in Hanoi, Mu Cang Chai, and Da Nang, affirming solid flying skills and stable competitive spirit.
pilot8.records: Over 10 years of experience and nearly 5,000 flights across Vietnam. Participated in most precision landing competitions and completed international standard flight safety training.
pilot8.personality: Flying with Toan Nguyen â€“ the 'Rambo' of the sky, you not only get to 'ride clouds' but also laugh till your cheeks hurt! He flies like wind, talks like wind, bringing a feeling of both safety and incredible fun. After flying, everyone wants to call him their 'personal pilot' for every trip. One guarantee: fly with Toan, you won't want to come down!

pilot9.name: Chien Thang
pilot9.des: 7 years living with clouds and wind, over 1,500 safe tandem flights, 1,000+ hours hovering in the sky. He once held the record for 9.5 hours of solo flying in Vietnam! 'Sweeping' paragliding competitions from North to South, always at peak performance.
pilot9.experience: With 7 years of experience as a companion to sky and clouds, he has completed over 1,500 safe and professional tandem flights, accumulating over 1,000 hours of flying. He once held Vietnam's #2 record for longest solo flight time â€” 9.5 hours continuous, demonstrating remarkable perseverance and excellent paraglide control skills. Deep understanding of paragliding techniques and weather conditions at flying sites across the country, he always ensures each flight is both safe and emotionally uplifting.
pilot9.records: Holds Vietnam's #2 record for longest solo flight time â€“ 9.5 hours continuous. Over 1,500 tandem flights and over 1,000 accumulated flying hours in 7 years of sky conquest.
pilot9.personality: Chien Thang â€“ 'Thunder God', flies fast as lightning yet makes you feel absolutely safe. Hovering in the sky with him, you'll laugh with joy not wanting to come down. Flying with him is not just an experience but an adventure full of laughter. Flying so long that even the clouds have to admire: 'Hey, don't you need a break?'

pilot10.name: Suman Thapa
pilot10.des: Most of the spectacular acrobatic videos at Sapa are from him â€“ an experienced pilot with deep understanding of paragliding. With him, flying is not just passion â€” it's a career. Customers call him by a special name: 'Child of the Wind God'.
pilot10.experience: Completed professional pilot training course in Nepal. An acro pilot with exceptional acrobatic skills, proficient in many complex technical maneuvers. He has over 1,000 hours of professional tandem flying, always ensuring absolute safety for passengers. Has been active for over 3 years in Vietnam, with deep understanding of terrain and weather conditions at flying sites in the country. Currently aims to become an internationally certified APPI paragliding instructor.
pilot10.records: Leading acro (acrobatic) pilot in Vietnam, famous for spectacular performances at Sapa. Possesses over 1,000 hours of tandem flying and 3 years of professional activity in Vietnam.
pilot10.personality: He is someone who when the wind rises â€” even before taking off â€” you can hear his heart cheering: 'Let's fly together!'. He is passionate about paragliding like someone addicted to morning coffee â€” indispensable, unstoppable. With him, each acrobatic maneuver is a smile affirming: 'We live to fly.'

pilot11.name: Alish Thapa
pilot11.des: Professional paragliding instructor with international APPI certification, invited by many organizations to teach. Not only professionally skilled, he is also a cheerful, friendly pilot, always bringing safe, interesting flights and making passengers love him from the first meeting.
pilot11.experience: He is the lead instructor and S&TA (Safety and Training Advisor) expert at Skydive Chiang Mai. At the same time, he holds the position of Operations Director at Insky Skydive and Everest Paragliding, as well as a professional instructor at Fishtail Nepal Paragliding. An internationally certified APPI paragliding instructor, and also a skydiving instructor (AFF-I, TAN-I) according to USPA standards. He has thousands of hours of training and actual flying experience in many Asian countries, including Vietnam, Thailand, and Nepal.
pilot11.records: International APPI instructor, has taught at many major flying sites in Vietnam, Thailand, and China. Holds management and operational positions at several reputable paragliding and skydiving organizations in the region.
pilot11.personality: He is one of Nepal's leading paragliding pilots, with a fun and inspiring teaching style. He helps students feel flying like a dance in the air â€” not just learning techniques but learning to love the sky. He brings positive energy to every flight, making visitors not only remember the trip but also remember that special companion.

pilot12.name: Bishal Thapa
pilot12.des: Passionate about precision landing, he always aims to touch down at the exact center with minimal error. This ensures every flight is safe and executed like a program. Cheerful and approachable, he always listens and cares about his passengers' feelings to provide the most complete flying experience.
pilot12.experience: He started learning paragliding in 2016 and became a professional tandem pilot in 2019. With over 2,000 tandem flights and more than 800 hours of flight time, he is one of the most experienced and stable pilots on the team. Bishal has achieved impressive results at domestic and international competitions, including: Pre-World Cup Mizoram Open Accuracy Championship 2018 (2nd place individual, 1st place team), Accuracy Paragliding Pre-World Cup 2023 (2nd place individual, 1st place team), and Indian Accuracy Cup Bilaspur (Individual Champion).
pilot12.records: Leading precision landing expert â€“ has won numerous titles at Pre-World Cup and international Accuracy Cup competitions. Possesses over 2,000 flights and 800+ hours of safe flying.
pilot12.personality: Bishal Thapa always carries a 'battery of energy' and a radiant smile on every flight. He is cheerful, likeable, and always makes passengers feel like they're flying with a close friend. Passionate about precision landing down to the millimeter, he transforms each landing into a beautiful 'dance' in the sky. Flying with him, you not only experience the sensation of flying, but also have an adventure full of laughter and emotions.

pilot13.name: Bishal Skyboy
pilot13.des: Professional pilot from Nepal, renowned worldwide for his impressive Acro aerobatic skills. Not only does he conquer the sky with top-notch technique, but he is also an experienced tandem pilot, bringing thrilling and unforgettable flying experiences to every passenger.
pilot13.experience: Professional Acro pilot from Nepal with many years of experience in aerobatic performances and tandem flight instruction. He has participated in numerous international flying events, renowned for his complex aerobatic techniques and absolute safety for passengers. He delivers exciting, emotional, and thrilling flying experiences.
pilot13.records: Renowned Acro pilot worldwide with exceptional aerobatic skills. Extensive tandem flying experience and safety record, participating in numerous international flying events.
pilot13.personality: Bishal Skyboy stands out with his skillful flying abilities and confident demeanor in the air. He delivers refreshing, exciting, and memorable flying experiences for all passengers, always maintaining a professional yet approachable and friendly attitude.

pilot14.name: Subash Thapa
pilot14.des: Professional paragliding instructor who has trained many paragliding pilots around the world. He not only has a passion for paragliding but also loves music, which is why every tandem flight with him is lively and full of inspiration.
pilot14.experience: He is a chief pilot, paragliding instructor, and skydiving instructor in Pokhara. He has also served as chief pilot at Acro Paragliding and New Para World Paragliding. He possesses over 1,000 hours of professional tandem flying and always prioritizes safety. With over 3 years of experience operating in Vietnam, Subash has solid knowledge of terrain and weather conditions at various flying sites.
pilot14.records: Over 1,000 hours of professional tandem flying, previously held the position of chief pilot at several reputable paragliding organizations, and has 3+ years of operating experience in Vietnam.
pilot14.personality: Subash Thapa is not only a top-notch paragliding instructor but also a 'DJ in the sky' with a burning passion for music, making every tandem flight feel like a lively party in the clouds. He always ensures absolute safety, helping you fly without worry. Flying with him, you not only experience soaring through the sky but also gain a cheerful friend full of positive energy!
